LanguageData.SY_BNR.BiosculpterPodDesc: Biosculpter pod dimensions Changes require reloading to apply properly!
LanguageData.SY_BNR.NeuralSuperchargerDesc: Neural supercharger dimensions Changes require reloading to apply properly!
LanguageData.SY_BNR.BiosculpterPodReadyEffecterColorR: Adjust the color (red) of the blinking effect when the Biosculpter is ready Changes require reloading! (I recommend R .5, G 1, B 1)
LanguageData.SY_BNR.BiosculpterPodReadyEffecterColorG: Adjust the color (green) of the blinking effect when the Biosculpter is ready Changes require reloading! (I recommend R .5, G 1, B 1)
LanguageData.SY_BNR.BiosculpterPodReadyEffecterColorB: Adjust the color (blue) of the blinking effect when the Biosculpter is ready Changes require reloading! (I recommend R .5, G 1, B 1)
